21239b29-94ce-4b94-9ea4-f825284858fd.name: Reaction Bonus
21239b29-94ce-4b94-9ea4-f825284858fd.notes: Readers and listeners of your work; literati.

183785d6-c749-4902-a60e-f2fc862ff119.name: Alternative Benefit
183785d6-c749-4902-a60e-f2fc862ff119.notes: +1/level to the first Influence roll (p. B359) of any kind made on an audience member (or several of them as a group) after a successful performance.

01a062f3-38c2-47c8-87b8-a8e6c8175e4d.name: 视力不良（远视）
01a062f3-38c2-47c8-87b8-a8e6c8175e4d.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

c2e397c1-93d1-4485-834e-ad3c79b8bf89.name: 视力不良（近视）
c2e397c1-93d1-4485-834e-ad3c79b8bf89.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks
